Game Levels for Boulder Dash Clone
The file format is as follows: Space seperated columns, one row per line.
- Outer wall = Brick D Dirt J Jem (The Diamond) B Boulder R Rockford * Empty Square X Enemy E Exit
-------------------------------------------
Edit the level by changing the width, length, and MapLayout.
